commands.name: css-audit
commands.description: Analyzes CSS for specificity, performance, and maintainability issues. Suggests fixes using modern CSS features (e.g., :where(), container queries).

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Path to the CSS file or code snippet to audit.

commands.name: modern-css
commands.description: Generates code using 2026 CSS features like container queries, :has(), and clamp().

parameters.name: component
parameters.description: Name of the component to generate (e.g., 'card').

commands.name: modern-layout
commands.description: Suggests flex/grid and container query solutions for a layout goal. Prefers responsive solutions with container queries where appropriate.

parameters.name: layout_description
parameters.description: Layout goal or mockup description (e.g., 'sidebar + main content', 'product grid').

example_input.layout_description: sidebar + main content, sidebar collapses on small screens

commands.example_output: CSS using flexbox, grid, container-type, @container, and logical properties (inline-size, margin-inline).

commands.name: design-tokens-css
commands.description: Converts design tokens (colors, spacing, typography) into CSS custom properties with optional dark/light theme support.

parameters.name: tokens
parameters.description: Design tokens as JSON or spec (e.g., design-tokens.json path or inline JSON).

commands.name: cascade-layers
commands.description: Restructures CSS using @layer (e.g., reset, base, components, utilities) for a clear cascade order.

parameters.name: css_content
parameters.description: CSS content or path to file to reorganize.

commands.example_output: @layer reset, base, components, utilities; ... layered CSS with explanation.
